      • getStopTimeout

        public long getStopTimeout()
        Get the timeout to wait for worker threads when this connector's JaffreConnector.stop() method is being called. The default value is 1000 milliseconds.
        Returns:
        The timeout in milliseconds.

      • setStopTimeout

        public void setStopTimeout(long p_lStopTimeout)
        Set the timeout to wait for worker threads when this connector's JaffreConnector.stop() method is being called.
        Parameters:
        p_lStopTimeout - The timeout in milliseconds.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - - If p_lStopTimeout is negative.
